revised_title: Determination of Triplet-Triplet Extinction Coefficients in Aromatic Compounds
tldr: The authors developed a new method to determine the extinction coefficients of triplet-triplet transitions in aromatic compounds using pulse radiolysis. They compared the extinction coefficients of benzophenone ketyl radical and the triplet states of several aromatic compounds, providing values for the extinction coefficients of anthracene, naphthalene, phenanthrene, and 1,2-benzanthracene.
